name: Car Parking - Kids Puzzle
description:
Car Parking - Kids Puzzle game is the Real Car Parking simulator will be more difficult as it's more level.

Very fun game for kids .
This car parking game has introduced a new concept. You need to park speed cars within limited time.

Car Parking - Kids Puzzle game have 2 mode
- Time Mode
- Casual Mode
Game play is simple . use two button control yout car
Park the car to he right place
